overview: Director Grant Scicluna jumps into VR with an adaptation of one of the tales from Jack Heathâ€™s short-story collection 300 Minutes of Danger. Here, in a potentially deadly case of mistaken identity, Nassim is poisoned and must engage in a heart-pumping game of cat and mouse to secure the antidote.
tagline: Time is not on your side
title: 30 Minutes of Danger
